config.power_networks.misc.useDoubleLead: Uses two leads for connections instead of one.
Causes minor z-fighting but always stays visible.
config.power_networks.client.segmentsPer: Decides how many segments a blocks worth of wire should consist of.
Dictates how low bellow the coils the wire can go.
config.power_networks.client.colors.tool: A list of colors for wire segments, will cycle.
screen.power_networks.disconnect.title: Do you want to close the world?
screen.power_networks.disconnect.message: You have changed options that require reopening the world. If you do not close the world some changes may only partially apply. You can fully apply the changes by closing the world.
